formattedAddress: 505 W 51st St, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 505 W 51st St, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: Glad to have found this place. It's hard to know where to go in NYC to find a trust worthy, timely and honest auto body shop. This place is it! Great family-owned shop with attention to detail. Will recommend to anyone needing repair.

text.text: Glad to have found this place. It's hard to know where to go in NYC to find a trust worthy, timely and honest auto body shop. This place is it! Great family-owned shop with attention to detail. Will recommend to anyone needing repair.

originalText.text: The best auto body place I’ve been to. The service was excellent. Dave is a great guy. Very respectful and only wants the best for you and your car.  The work was done fast and and Excellent. My car looked brand new when I picked it up only 1 day in a half after I dropped it off. If you need auto body work done on your vehicle go to Dave’s collision auto repair shop. I will not go anywhere else after my experience there.

text.text: The best auto body place I’ve been to. The service was excellent. Dave is a great guy. Very respectful and only wants the best for you and your car.  The work was done fast and and Excellent. My car looked brand new when I picked it up only 1 day in a half after I dropped it off. If you need auto body work done on your vehicle go to Dave’s collision auto repair shop. I will not go anywhere else after my experience there.

originalText.text: I would give six stars if I could maybe seven. Can I give 10? Dave's is a wonderful place to get your car repaired. The work is done expertly. Everyone is friendly. It's like that idyllic small town repair shop in the middle of a big city!

text.text: I would give six stars if I could maybe seven. Can I give 10? Dave's is a wonderful place to get your car repaired. The work is done expertly. Everyone is friendly. It's like that idyllic small town repair shop in the middle of a big city!

originalText.text: I went to Dave’s Collision for repair to my BMW.  They did an excellent job, and the cost was exactly as estimated and reasonable for the work performed.  The service, communication and scheduling was impeccable.  This is a family run business going into its third generation.  The visits were pleasant and actually fun!  We need to keep these businesses going. Thanks  Dave and Rich!

text.text: I went to Dave’s Collision for repair to my BMW.  They did an excellent job, and the cost was exactly as estimated and reasonable for the work performed.  The service, communication and scheduling was impeccable.  This is a family run business going into its third generation.  The visits were pleasant and actually fun!  We need to keep these businesses going. Thanks  Dave and Rich!

originalText.text: By far the best auto body repair experience I've had in NYC.  Very nice and honest people, clean shop, super fast.  I wish there were more businesses  in NYC like Dave's.  I had a scratch caused by an Icon garage, and Dave's coordinated directly with Icon and their insurance.  Called on a Monday to set up the appt, dropped off on  Wednesday, and picked up on Thursday.  Highly recommend.
